changes: Implemented monster-type-specific death sound effects in handleMonsterHit()

patterns_discovered: Consistent audio manager initialization across different scene types
Dependency injection pattern for audio management
gotchas_discovered: Need to check audioManager exists before playing sounds
Requires dynamic sfx key generation based on monster type
Potential performance considerations with dynamic sound loading

approach_outcome.key_achievement: Added type-specific monster death sound effects

recommendations: Implement a centralized sound configuration for monster types
Add error handling for missing sound effects
Consider preloading monster death sounds for performance
Create a mapping of monster types to sound effect keys
